articles.title: Briefing Marks International Day of Yoga
articles.content:
Briefing Marks International Day of Yoga 
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- A briefing to mark the International Day of Yoga was held in the DPRK on Sunday.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Public Health Kim Hyong Hun, officials concerned including those from public health and educational fields and foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Ajay Kumar Sharma and his embassy staff members were present there.
					
					 The participants watched a video on yoga pervasive in India and other countries as a fitness exercise.
					
					 They enjoyed yoga demonstration after being briefed on yoga.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Japanese Reactionaries against Justifying "Right to Collective Self-defense"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Japanese Reactionaries against Justifying "Right to Collective Self-defense"
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The present Japanese ruling quarters recently made such sophism that the amendment to a law related to security that will enable the exercise of the "right to collective self-defense" is consistent with the Constitution as it ensures "logical conformity and legal security."
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary dismisses it as nonsense.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seeking to expand worldwide the sphere of activities of the "Self-Defense Forces" which had been limited to the vicinity of Japan and exercise the "right to collective self-defense" under the pretext of military aid to its allies, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Japan's exercise of the "right" precisely means a war.
					
					 If a law related to security is amended, the Japanese people will be left with no other choice but to be drawn into a war. This is neither anticipation nor supposition.
					
					 Japan hacked Asia while getting keen on aggression and war in the past, brutally killing people there. It is quite clear what outrageous crimes Japan would perpetrate if it opts for reinvasion.
					
					 The commentary warns that Japan's overseas aggression will precisely lead to ruin and self-destruction.

articles.title: Japan's Proper Settlement of Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Proper Settlement of Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea made public a statement on June 15 in demand of the proper settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the present chief executive talked about "big progress" and "last phase of negotiations" regarding the issue of sexual slavery at the press conference with The Washington Post.
					
					 The negotiations should discuss the intention of the victims of sexual slavery to have their just rights guaranteed through Japan's admission and preparation for its crimes, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should demand the Japanese government make proper settlement of the past crimes related to sexual slavery.

articles.title: U.S. Moves for Bio-chemical Warfare Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Moves for Bio-chemical Warfare Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social measure council for denouncing illegal introduction and experiment of anthrax germ held a press conference before the U.S. embassy in Seoul on June 16 to condemn the U.S. north-targeted bio-chemical warfare. The council groups more than 50 south Korean civic organizations including the Green Federation and the Bar Association for Democratic Society.
					 Speakers said that the U.S. forces illegally introduced the anthrax germ into south Korea.
					
					 Tens of days have passed since the case of anthrax germ but the "government" is failing to conduct any investigation into it, they charged.
					
					 On the same day the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification held a meeting before the U.S. embassy to denounce the moves of the U.S. forces in south Korea for bio-chemical warfare.
					
					 Speakers stressed that U.S. forces' introduction of anthrax germ is for bio-chemical warfare, calling for actions for revealing the U.S. criminal atrocity.

articles.title: GIs Commit Brutal Violence against Aged S. Korean Couple
articles.content:
GIs Commit Brutal Violence against Aged S. Korean Couple
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- GIs in south Korea committed brutal violence against an aged couple running an inn in Ryongsan District, Seoul on June 6, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 A drunken female GI came to the inn together with three other Americans that day, bullying the couple to offer them a room.
					
					 As the owner of the inn declined, saying men and women can not use the same room, they kicked and beat him.
					
					 As the couple attempted to call the police, the GIs cut off telephone line and had the eardrum of the aged broken and their waists badly hurt.
					
					 South Koreans are falling victim to GIs and live in uneasiness as the group of barbarians lords it over south Korea.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Support Statement of DPRK Government
 Tokyo, June 20 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements on June 19 in support of the statement of the DPRK government on opening up a decisive phase for the improvement of the north-south relations under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 Hwang Myong, chairperson of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the statement of the DPRK government instilled fresh hope and confidence into all the Koreans including the Koreans in Japan aspiring after Korea's reunification.
					
					 Pak Jong Song, chairperson of the Hokkaido Headquarters of Chongryon, said a shortcut to ending confrontation between the north and the south and advancing toward reconciliation and reunification lies in implementing the joint declaration as was clarified in the statement of the DPRK government in the light of the history of the national division and the acute situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the prevailing situation urgently requires the north and the south to end the division and opt for reconciliation and reunification under the banner of the joint declaration.
					
					 Kim Yu Won, chairperson of the Ibaraki Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, evinced the will to work hard for the reunification of the nation, its cherished desire, under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jang Thae Ho, chairman of the Fukushima Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that support for and implementation of the statement of the DPRK government is precisely the way of implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the officials and other Koreans of the headquarters have actively joined the people in the homeland in their endeavors to open up a wide avenue to national reunification under the banner of the joint declaration, adding that in this course they cherished the belief that reunification will come early if all Koreans pool their efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Dominica, Peru, Mali and Slovenia from June 7 to 12 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The general secretary of the United Left Movement of Dominica said that Kim Jong Il inherited the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung to resolutely smash the imperialists' moves for stifling the DPRK and firmly defend Korean socialism. 
					
					 The international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru said that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK firmly defended the banner of Juche and socialism. 
					
					 He added it is his sincere hope that only victory and prosperity will always be in store for the WPK and the Korean people.
					
					 The principal of Progres School of Mali praised Kim Jong Il as the great leader and ardent patriot as he protected the destiny of the country and nation and laid a solid foundation for the prosperity of the generations to come.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the lecture in Dominica.

articles.title: Significant Day of WPK Observed by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Significant Day of WPK Observed by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries between June 5 and 13 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included round-table talks, lecture and film shows in Iran, Indonesia, Finland and Germany.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Monument to Party Founding".
					
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran praised Kim Jong Il as a great statesman with transparent independent stand against imperialism.
					
					 He said that the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il before the development of the friendly relations between Iran and the DPRK and the cause of independence against imperialism would be immortal.
					
					 The international secretary of the Finnish Communists' League noted that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and firmly defended the cause of socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 A vice-chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association stressed that the WPK founded by the President and developed by Kim Jong Il would win only victories as it is holding supreme leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party-building Exploits Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party-building Exploits Praised by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported special program to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The paper of DR Congo L'Avenir on June 10 carried articles including "Creator of Songun politics, defender of socialism," "Undying exploits for national reunification," "Great sun of Korean nation Kim Jong Un" under the headline "The great leader Kim Jong Il and WPK" together with photos dealing with his revolutionary activities. 
					
					 Referring to the exploits he performed for party-building and national reunification, the paper said nothing in the world can check the advance of the Korean people led by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Proretaren, organ of the Communist Party of Sweden, on June 9 carried an article praising Kim Jong Il as a prominent statesman and a great leader who developed the WPK into the invincible revolutionary party, powerful political staff of the Songun revolution. 
					
					 The Pakistani paper Election Times on June 2 carried an article introducing his party-building and leadership exploits. 
					
					 The Congolese TV aired Korean film "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: Rosy Is Future of DPRK: Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Rosy Is Future of DPRK: Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Children are the king of the country" on June 2.
					 The article said that children of the DPRK are fully displaying their talent at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace and other schoolchildren's palaces across the country.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The children's camps can be seen successfully spruced up in every scenic place in the DPRK.
					
					 In the DPRK orphans are also enjoying happiness.
					
					 The newly-built Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage are equipped with all amenities necessary for the living of orphans.
					
					 The DPRK has a lot of such dreamlike stories about trains running for children in the mountainous villages and branch schools built just for a few children on lighthouse islets.
					
					 Everything for children including the schoolchildren's palaces and children's camps in the DPRK is drawing special attention of the world public as it is for the children of the working people, not for those of the millionaires or privileged class.
					
					 Rosy is the future of the DPRK, a country regarding the children as the king of the country.

articles.title: Austrian Body Urges S. Korean Authorities to Implement North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Austrian Body Urges S. Korean Authorities to Implement North-South Joint Declaration
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Austrian Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea sent a protest letter to the south Korean embassy in Vienna on June 15, the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The letter demanded a stop to all confrontation rackets including war drills the south Korean authorities stage with the U.S. against the fellow countrymen in the north on the 15th anniversary of the joint declaration.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It's time to sincerely try to implement the joint declaration for the peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities immediately release prisoners who struggled for peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 We express the belief that Korea will be reunified peacefully.

articles.title: Czech Organization Accuses U.S. of Its Atrocities during Korean War
articles.content:
Czech Organization Accuses U.S. of Its Atrocities during Korean War
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The Young Communist League of Czechoslovakia posted on its website on June 3 an article titled "DPRK versus U.S.: Who is true" on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Disclosing the U.S. red-herring to mar the growing international prestige of the DPRK, the article said:
					
					 The majority of Americans do not know the fact that many innocent Korean people died due to the U.S. troops' bombing during the past Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists perpetrated merciless destruction and killing through indiscriminate bombing and shelling while crying out for completely removing 78 cities of north Korea from the map. As a result cities and rural villages of Korea were ruthlessly destroyed.
					
					 Many families and their relatives have lived separated for over 6 decades since the end of the Korean war.
					
					 Many south Koreans were also brutally killed by the U.S. troops during the war but the U.S. government denies this fact.
					
					 Americans should discern the truth and be aware of the sufferings of the Korean people.

articles.title: UK Organizations Hope DPRK's Proposals Would Bring Good Results
articles.content:
UK Organizations Hope DPRK's Proposals Would Bring Good Results
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK issued a joint statement on June 16 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The joint statement fully supported the statement of the DPRK government "It is necessary to open up an epochal phase in the development of the north-south relations under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration".
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration is a shining result brought about by leader Kim Jong Il's unremitting efforts and Songun politics, it said, and went on:
					
					 Owing to the vicious moves of the Lee Myung Bak conservative group of south Korea totally denying the joint declaration, the inter-Korean relations went back to the past era of the confrontation and the ensuing catastrophic phase has reached more serious stage.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop at once the war drills against the DPRK which they stage in collusion with the U.S. and their groundless "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 We sincerely hope that the DPRK's proposals would bring about good results in the struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Swiss, Austrian Bodies Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Swiss, Austrian Bodies Support Statement of DPRK Government
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Swiss and Austrian bodies fully supported the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on June 16 noted:
					
					 The DPRK government clarified the following stand in the statement released on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration out of its will to repair the north-south relations and open up a turning phase for achieving national reconciliation and unity:
					
					1. It is necessary to have a firm stand to improve the north-south relations and solve the reunification issue independently by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.
					
					2. The south Korean authorities should not seek "unification of social systems" inciting distrust and confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					3. The south Korean authorities should stop north-targeted war exercises in collusion with the U.S.
					
					4. It is necessary to create a climate for mending the north-south relations.
					
					5. The north and the south should take practical measures to implement the historic north-south joint declarations.
					
					  The statement urged the south Korean regime not to depend on outsiders any more, to begin with, but to stop staging north-targeted war drills which it stages in league with the U.S.
					
					 The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche idea in Vienna, Austria in a statement on June 17 extended full support to the statement of the DPRK government and demanded the south Korean regime respond to the stand of the DPRK and opt for repairing the north-south relations.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK Government Supported by Personages of Ghana, Nigeria
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK Government Supported by Personages of Ghana, Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, June 21 (KCNA) -- Personages of Ghana and Nigeria released a statement on June 16 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is a historic document that has made not only all Koreans but other progressive people in the world hopeful and optimistic about Korea's reunification as it affirmed the Korean nation's will to reunify the country by its own efforts free from interference of outsiders.
					
					 The south Korean regime should immediately respond to the just demand of the DPRK and make this year, 70 years since Korea's division, a significant year for opening up a turning phase in the drive for achieving national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, urged the south Korean regime to stop perpetrating hostile acts against the DPRK and kicking up war drills against it in collusion with the U.S. and respond to the DPRK's proposal for paving a broad avenue to independent reunification by bringing about a decisive turn and change in the north-south relations.
